tag_list: clara-llamas, strategic-development, classified-media, russia, cis, cee
overview: With a decade of multinational experience in digital media, Clara Llamas belongs to an exclusive group of experts in strategic development for the classified advertising community. Specialized in strategy and product development, she has planned successful digital classified operations in Spain, Russia, Hungary and Croatia, among others. Clara is fluent in English, Spanish and French. She holds a B.Sc. from New York University, USA, and a post-graduate degree in Project Management & Finance from the Chamber of Commerce, Spain.
